DOC.brief_title: Saliva Analysis After Low-level Laser Therapy Application Masseter Muscle Located Above Parotid Salivary Gland
DOC.detailed_description: Climate : The study conduce Lasertherapy Photobiology Center ( CELAFO ) Institute Research Development University Vale Paraíba ( UNIVAP ) , air-conditioned temperature 22 ° C. Volunteers : 30 male volunteer age 18 30 year . Flow Analysis Salivary pH saliva buffer capacity LLLT LLLT : Two consecutive sample whole saliva obtain second volunteer . The first , unstimulated total saliva ( UTS ) second stimulate total saliva ( STS ) . Obtaining mechanically give chew paraffin 5cm² fragment . The gathering hold afternoon patient breakfast least one hour . All volunteer instruct brush teeth use mouthwash one hour prior saliva collection experiment . The sample collect UTS STS request voluntary saliva deposit directly sterile universal collector . Salivary sample compare universal table salivary flow describe Saliva sample centrifuge 1200 rpm 10 minute . All saliva volume produce 5-minute period measure use test tube record milliliter . The pH measure pH meter device . To test buffer capacity , saliva ( 3 mL ) place Falcon tube contain 9 mL 0,005 normal hydrochloric acid , subject manual shake 10 second , maintain rest 10 minute open Falcon tube , aim evaporation gas carbon dioxide could interfere analysis . After 10 minute pH measure litmus tape aid compare color scale provide manufacturer . Low Level Laser Therapy ( LLLT ) : The investigator use LLLT first collection saliva , control therapy apply , placebo LLLT red LLLT infrared.The treatment apply interval 7 day randomize , control , double-blind , draw lot . Irradiation LLLT conduct eight ( 8 ) point skin masseter region . The distance point 1cm . To know exactly location point , transparency sheet use ( irradiation feedback ) reference point volunteer , follow : point 1 commissure eyelid , point 2 tragus ear point 3 labial commissure.The anticipated period 15 minute occur desired effect LLLT perform new material collection . Data Analysis : The salivary flow data , pH buffering capacity saliva analyze use analysis program statistic nonparametric Kruskal-Wallis test . The significance level 5 % ( p < 0.05 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Have dental organ Male volunteer Age 18 30 year Body mass index 18.5 25 ( normal ) . Presence problem compromise physiological activity masticatory system Neurological disorder Cerebral Palsy parafunctions : Sucking finger Nail bite Nibble object Bruxism Mouth breathing . Use medication : Antihistamines Benzodiazepines Depressants central nervous system . Temporomandibular dysfunction : Clenching teeth Bruxism Use partial full denture .
